verses.verse: <S%G1161>Moreover,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> we <S%G1107>do<s%> you to <S%G1107>wit<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>bestowed<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G3109>Macedonia;<s%>

How that in a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1382>trial<s%> of <S%G2347>affliction<s%> the <S%G4050>abundance<s%> of their <S%G5479>joy<s%> and their <S%G899>deep<s%> <S%G4432>poverty<s%> <S%G4052>abounded<s%> to the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of their <S%G572>liberality.<s%>
For to their <S%G1411>power,<s%> I <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>record,<s%> yes, and <S%G5228>beyond<s%> their <S%G1411>power<s%> they were <S%G830>willing<s%> of <S%G830>themselves;<s%>

<S%G1189>Praying<s%> us with <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3874>entreaty<s%> that we would <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G5485>gift,<s%> and take on us the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G1248>ministering<s%> to the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And this they did, not as we <S%G1679>hoped,<s%> but <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> their own <S%G1438>selves<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and to us by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1519>So<s%> that we <S%G3870>desired<s%> <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> that as he had <S%G4278>begun,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> he would <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2005>finish<s%> in you the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G235>Therefore,<s%> as you <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> thing, in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G3056>utterance,<s%> and <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>diligence,<s%> and in <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> to us, see that you <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

I <S%G3004>speak<s%> not by <S%G2003>commandment,<s%> but by <S%G1223>occasion<s%> of the <S%G4710>forwardness<s%> of <S%G2087>others,<s%> and to <S%G1381>prove<s%> the <S%G1103>sincerity<s%> of <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>

For you <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that, though he was <S%G4145>rich,<s%> yet for <S%G5216>your<s%> sakes he <S%G4433>became<s%> <S%G4433>poor,<s%> that you through his <S%G4432>poverty<s%> might be <S%G4147>rich.<s%>

And <S%G1722>herein<s%> <S%G5129><s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> my <S%G1106>advice:<s%> for <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G4851>expedient<s%> for you, <S%G3748>who<s%> have <S%G4278>begun<s%> <S%G4278>before,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G4160>do,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> to be <S%G2309>forward<s%> a <S%G4070>year<s%> <S%G575>ago.<s%>

<S%G3570>Now<s%> <S%G2532>therefore<s%> <S%G2005>perform<s%> the <S%G4160>doing<s%> of it; that as there was a <S%G4288>readiness<s%> to <S%G2309>will,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> there may be a <S%G2005>performance<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> out of that which you <S%G2192>have.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G4295>first<s%> a <S%G4288>willing<s%> <S%G4288>mind,<s%> it is <S%G2144>accepted<s%> <S%G2526>according<s%> to that a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2192>has,<s%> and not <S%G2526>according<s%> to that he <S%G2192>has<s%> not.
For I mean not that <S%G243>other<s%> men be <S%G425>eased,<s%> and you <S%G2347>burdened:<s%>

But by an <S%G2471>equality,<s%> that <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568><s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4051>abundance<s%> may be a supply for their <S%G5303>want,<s%> that their <S%G4051>abundance<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may be a supply for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5303>want:<s%> that there may be <S%G2471>equality:<s%>
As it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> He that had gathered <S%G4183>much<s%> had <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G4121>over;<s%> and he that had gathered <S%G3641>little<s%> had <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1641>lack.<s%>

But <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1325>put<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>earnest<s%> <S%G4710>care<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G5103>Titus<s%> for you.

For <S%G3303>indeed<s%> he <S%G1209>accepted<s%> the <S%G3874>exhortation;<s%> but <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G4707>more<s%> <S%G4707>forward,<s%> of his <S%G830>own<s%> <S%G830>accord<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> to you.
And we have <S%G4842>sent<s%> with him the <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> is in the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G1223>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches;<s%>

And not that <S%G3440>only,<s%> but who was <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5500>chosen<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches<s%> to <S%G4898>travel<s%> with us with <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1247>administered<s%> by us to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and declaration of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4288>ready<s%> <S%G4288>mind:<s%>

<S%G4724>Avoiding<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G3469>blame<s%> us in <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G100>abundance<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1247>administered<s%> by us:
<S%G4306>Providing<s%> for <S%G2570>honest<s%> things, not <S%G3440>only<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

And we have <S%G4842>sent<s%> with them our <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G4178>oftentimes<s%> <S%G1381>proved<s%> <S%G4705>diligent<s%> in <S%G4183>many<s%> things, but <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G4707>more<s%> <S%G4707>diligent,<s%> on the <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> I have in you.

<S%G1535>Whether<s%> any do inquire of <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> he is my <S%G2844>partner<s%> and fellow <S%G4904>helper<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> you: <S%G1535>or<s%> our <S%G80>brothers<s%> be inquired of, they are the <S%G652>messengers<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches,<s%> and the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3767>Why<s%> <S%G1731>show<s%> you to them, and <S%G1519>before<s%> <S%G4383><s%> the <S%G1577>churches,<s%> the <S%G1732>proof<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> and of our <S%G2746>boasting<s%> <S%G5228>on<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5228>behalf.<s%>
